altTitles.th: ครูพิเศษจอมป่วน รีบอร์น!

description.en: Tsuna comes home one day, only to be greeted by a little baby mafioso who apparently is his new home tutor. His job is to guide Tsuna into his role as the 10th Boss of the Vongola mafia family. With the help of all his new friends and an array of special items such as the "Dying Will Bullet", he might just be able to do it.
description.ru: Тсунаёши Савада— на первый взгляд самый обыкновенный мальчик. Слегка невезуч, слегка неуклюж, слегка паникёр. Хотя, может, и не слегка. И все в его жизни скучно и безрадостно, до того волшебного момента, как пред его взором предстаёт чудо-ребёнок Реборн, который на деле оказывается давно зарекомендовавшим себя в мафиозном мире киллером. Реборн мило радует Тсуну, что отныне тот назначается наследником крупнейшей мафиозной семьи Вонгола, и что он, Реборн, обязуется сделать из него надлежащего босса. С этого дня жизнь Савады кардинально меняется…

title.en: ORIGINAL CHRONICLE Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The 1st

altTitles.ja: ORIGINAL CHRONICLE 魔法少女リリカルなのはThe 1st

description.en: The supplemental manga for Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha Movie 1st, adding scenes inspired by both the original anime season and its Sound Stages into the movie verse.

altTitles.ja: キラキラ☆プリキュアアラモード

description.en: 14-year-old Ichika Usami loves sweets and wishes to become a patisserie. When she encounters fairy Pekorin, she is able to transform into Cure Whip to protect Kirakiraru, an energy that represents the feelings put into making a sweet, from the Kirakiraru Thieves. Ichika joins five other girls to form the KiraKira Pretty Cure team and protect the sweets!

title.en: Rebirth of the Urban Immortal Cultivator

altTitles.vi: Trọng SInh Đô Thị Tu Tiên

description.en: Chen Fan died in the midst of divine tribulation, having reached the pinnacle of the cultivation world in less than 500 years. Somehow, despite the loss of his cultivation base, he was able to return to his youth as a high school student living on Earth. He decided to once again tread the path to immortality, armed with the knowledge he had gathered in his past life, to overwrite his past mistakes, remove his lingering regrets, and set a firm spiritual foundation that will guarantee success in his inevitable attempt to once again ascend to another plane of existence.
description.pt: Chen Fan morreu no meio da tribulação divina, tendo atingido o ápice do mundo do cultivo em menos de 500 anos. De alguma forma, apesar da perda de sua base de cultivo, ele foi capaz de retornar à sua juventude como um estudante universitário que vivia na Terra. Ele decidiu mais uma vez trilhar o caminho para a imortalidade, armado com o conhecimento que reuniu em sua vida passada, para substituir seus erros do passado, remover seus arrependimentos prolongados e estabelecer uma firme base espiritual que garantirá sucesso em sua inevitável tentativa de uma vez. novamente suba para outro plano de existência.
description.vi: Truyện Trọng Sinh Đô Thị Tu Tiên được chuyển thể từ tiểu thuyết cùng tên của tác giả Thập Lý Kiếm Thần Bắc Huyền Tiên Tôn Trần Phàm do tu hành quá nhanh mà độ kiếp thất bại. Trở về thời niên thiếu ở trái đất, pháp bảo, thần thông, tiên khí đều không còn. Hắn nhớ lại ân oán tình thù ngày trước, quyết tâm đền bù đầy đủ, tu hành một thế, trúc vô thượng đạo cơ, rũ sạch tâm ma... thành tựu Chân Tiên đại đạo
description.pt-br: Chen Fanyu morreu no meio da tribulação divina, tendo atingido o ápice do mundo do cultivo em menos de 500 anos. De alguma forma, apesar da perda de sua base de cultivo, ele foi capaz de retornar à sua juventude como um estudante universitário que vivia na Terra. Ele decidiu mais uma vez trilhar o caminho para a imortalidade, armado com o conhecimento que reuniu em sua vida passada, para substituir seus erros do passado, remover seus arrependimentos prolongados e estabelecer uma firme base espiritual que garantirá sucesso em sua inevitável tentativa de uma vez. novamente suba para outro plano de existência.

description.en:
After the death of his father, Kuga Ichirou, a shoujo mangaka fresh out of high school, has to take care of his two little siblings, Machi and Fumio, all by himself. Struggling to meet a deadline after his previous assistants get their manga debuts, he hires a new assistant through his editor. However, his life takes an unexpected turn after this new assistant is revealed to be a beautiful and mysterious girl…

[Official English](https://kodansha.us/series/a-galaxy-next-door/)
description.pt-br: Depois da morte de seu pai, Kuga Ichirou, um mangaká de shoujo recém-saído do colégio, tem que cuidar sozinho dos seus dois irmãos menores, Machi e Fumio. Lutando para cumprir o prazo depois que seus assistentes anteriores estrearam com mangá, ele contrata um novo assistente através do seu editor. Contudo, sua vida tem uma virada inesperada depois que esse novo assistente é revelada ser uma garota linda e misteriosa...

description.en:
Fugo, a rookie exorcist, burns with hatred for the demon who destroyed his family.
His master, concerned about Fugo's obsession with revenge, urges him to speak with a certain demon.
This demon is "Ilya."
As Fugo engages in repeated conversations with her, gradually, he has a change of heart...

Source: MangaPlus
description.ja:
家族を奪った悪魔への憎悪を燃やす新人祓魔師のフーゴ。
師は、憎しみに囚われるフーゴを咎め、とある悪魔憑きと話すように促す。
その悪魔憑きこそが「イリヤ」。
彼女と対話を重ねるうちにフーゴの心は変化していき…

title.en: Project SEKAI COLORFUL STAGE! feat. Hatsune Miku Comic Anthology

altTitles.ja: プロジェクトセカイ カラフルステージ！ feat.初音ミク　コミックアンソロジー

description.en: Official anthology for the game Project Sekai

altTitles.th: วัยซนคนมีพลังจิต

description.en: Young Mikan runs away to Tokyo to follow her best friend, Hotaru, who has been enrolled in an exclusive, secretive private school for geniuses. But it turns out that Alice Academy is a lot more than meets the eye. If Mikan wants to stay by Hotaru's side, she has to both pass the strange "entrance exam" and face the even greater challenge of befriending her very odd new classmates. Whether it's Hotaru's gift for inventing gadgets, the cranky Natsume's fire-casting ability, or Professor Narumi's control of human pheromones, everyone at the school has some sort of special talent. But what ability, if any, does Mikan possess? Mikan is going to have to rely on her courage and spunk if she's going to stay in school, or even stay alive!
description.pl: Mikan Sakura dorastała u swojego dziadka na wsi w Japonii. Pewnego dnia jej najlepsza przyjaciółka, Hotaru, oświadczyła, że przeniosi się do prestiżowej szkoły w Tokio. Mikan jako jej oddana przyjaciółka bez namysłu za nią podążyła. Szkoła ta jest tak naprawdę elitarną Akademią dla ludzi obdarowanych indywidualną mocą „Alice”. Lecz czy całkiem zwykła Mikan jest w stanie dostać się do tak elitarnej szkoły? Przekonajcie się sami!

description.en: Youshou Xihua- a non-canon, spinoff slice-of-life mini-theater of the Youshou Yan Manga unrelated to the main plotline. Go read the main story [here](https://mangadex.org/title/151bca3e-db98-4ad2-8d8d-239943b91437/you-shou-yan).

title.en: Tsukushitagari na Uchi no Yome ni Tsuite Derete mo Ii ka

altTitles.ja: 尽くしたがりなうちの嫁についてデレてもいいか？

altTitles.en: Can I Brag About My Very Devoted Wife to You?
Can I be Loving Towards my Wife Who Wants to Do All Kinds of Things?
We Started a So Sweet Newlywed Life

altTitles.zh-hk: 我可以對無比賢惠的妻子撒嬌嗎？

altTitles.pt-br: Posso amar minha esposa que quer fazer todo tipo de coisa?

description.en: There's the flower of Takamine High, Hanae Riko, whom every boy admires. Then, there's the plain boy, Niiyama Minato, who got proposed to by that most beautiful girl in school. Without knowing what's happening, the curtain on their newlywed life rises! For some reason, my bride, who's too cute and happily follows me around everywhere, refuses to leave my side...
description.ja: 「わ、私を……っ、あなたのお嫁さんにしてくれませんか……？」　学園一の美少女・花江りこに逆プロポーズされ、わけのわからないうちに、りことの共同生活を始めた俺。だけど、うぬぼれてはいけない。これは契約結婚。――そのはずなのに、「なんでそんな尽くしてくれるんだ？」と尋ねたら、彼女はむうっと頬を膨らませて「湊人くん、ニブすぎだよ……」と言ってきた。え……俺たちがしたのって契約結婚でいいんだよな……？　交際ゼロ日婚からはじまる、ひたすら幸せなだけの両片想いラブストーリー☆
description.pt-br: Hanae Riko, a garota mais bonita da Takamine High, que todo garoto admira. Niiyama Minato, um garoto simples, que foi proposto em casamento por essa mesma garota. Sem saber o que está acontecendo, as cortinas de sua vida de recém-casados ​​sobem! Por alguma razão, minha noiva, que é muito fofa e me segue alegremente por toda parte, se recusa a sair do meu lado...

description.en:
Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states period. Kingdom is the story of a young boy named Shin who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.  

---
  
- **Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2013**
- **Earned a Guinness World Record on December 12, 2012 for Manga written by the most people. -Note- The record was due to its "Social Kingdom" campaign in which fans and other artists were given the task of redrawing the entire 26th volume.**

As of June 2022, Kingdom has over 90 million copies in circulation, making it one of the currently best-selling manga series of all time. 

Parution: Weekly Young Jump

---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Meian](https://www.meian-editions.fr/meian/licence/kingdom/1131)  
- In Italian by [J-pop](https://j-pop.it/it/fumetti/manga/kingdom.html)
description.fr:
**Cette Histoire se déroule avant notre ère.**

La chine, qui n'est pas encore unifiée, traverse une grande guerre de cinq siècles. Shin, un jeune garçon contemporain de ces temps violents et houleux, cherche, par la seule force de son épée, à se faire un nom sous les cieux !!!
___
**Kingdom en France, le manga tant attendu ! Véritable phénomène au Japon !**
- Élu meilleur manga au 17e Grand Prix Culturel Osamu Tezuka (2013)
- Meilleur manga seinen vendu au Japon depuis 2015 (source : Oricon)
- 3ème meilleur manga vendu au Japon en 2016 et 2017 (source : Oricon)
description.uk: Мільйони років минуло з часів легенд, коли світ людей і богів був єдиним. У ті часи бажання людини верховодило над світом. Це була епоха 500-річної війни, період ворожих держав. «Королівство» — історія про хлопчину на ім’я Сінь, котрий прагне стати найвеличнішим генералом та про безліч випробувань та скитань, повз які пролягатиме його шлях до мети.
description.pt-br: Milhões de anos se passaram desde os tempos de lendas, quando os mundos dos homens e deuses ainda eram os mesmos. Nestes tempos eram os desejos do homem que mudaram o mundo. É o período da guerra de 500 anos: a Era dos Reinos Combatentes. Kingdom é a história de um garoto órfão e pobre tem o sonho de se tornar um grande general e assim começando seu caminho de provações e derramamento de sangue que o levarão até o topo das lendas!

title.en: Isekai Shoukan Oji-san no Juumusou Life ~Sabage Suki Salaryman wa Kaisha Owari ni Isekai e Chokki suru~

altTitles.ja: 異世界召喚おじさんの銃無双ライフ 〜サバゲー好きサラリーマンは会社終わりに異世界へ直帰する〜

altTitles.ru: Призванный в потусторонний мир дядя - живёт оружейным воином

altTitles.en: The Gunner's Life of a Middle-aged Man Summoned to Another World and Armed with a Rifle: An Airsoft Addicted Salaryman Returns to the Alternative World After Work

altTitles.id: Om-Om Pegawai Kantoran Pecinta Airsoft Pergi Ke Dunia Lain

altTitles.vi: Cuộc sống "thiện xạ" của ông chú được triệu hồi sang dị giới

description.en: The middle-aged man and airsoft enthusiast Daisuke Koga is summoned to a different world on his 40th birthday. Given the ability to turn airsoft guns into real guns, Daisuke must save the other world while traveling back and forth between reality and the fantasy world. Alongside female swordsman Rena, Daisuke becomes the only gun user and dominates in the fantasy world after work!
description.id: Seorang om-om yang hobi bermain airsoft bernama koga daisuke telah terpanggil ke dunai lain pada ulang tahunnya yang ke-40. Dianugerahi sebuah kekuatan untuk mengubah senjata airsoft menjadi senjata asli, daisuke harus bisa menyelamatkan dunia tersebut selagi bolak-balik dari dunia lain ke dunia nyata. bersama dengan seorang ksatria bernama lena, daisuke menjadi satu-satunya pengguna senapan yang akan mendominasi dunia lain tersebut sepulang kerja!
description.ja: サバゲー好きのサラリーマン・古賀大介は、40歳の誕生日を迎えた日に異世界に召喚された。現実と異世界を行き来しながら、異世界を救うことになった大介に与えられたのは、「エアガンを本物の銃に変化させる能力」。異世界で出会った女性剣士・レナと共に、大介は唯一の銃使いとして会社終わりに異世界で無双する!!

altTitles.th: เซียนเกมรักขอเป็นเทพนักจีบ

altTitles.vi: Thế giới chỉ có Thánh thần biết

description.en:
Keima Katsuragi is a high school student better known online as the "God of Conquest," the man who can obtain the heart of any dating sim girl. In his opinion, real life is an awful game; three-dimensional girls are annoying and false representations of how a real girl should be.  
  
One afternoon, while taking a break from cleaning duty, he stumbles across a strange message that goads him to conquer a girl. On a whim, he accepts, and his consent summons a girl named Elucia "Elsie" de Lute Ima, a denizen of hell tasked with capturing runaway spirits that have festered in girls' hearts. Keima is shocked and tries to escape, but Elsie tells him that failure in fulfilling the newly-formed contract will result in the termination of his life!   
  
Tasked with capturing the runaway spirits, Keima uses his expertise and knowledge of dating sims to obtain the hearts of girls in real life.

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media Komputindo as **The World God Only Knows** (2012)
description.pl: Czy nieuleczalny otaku może być idealnym facetem? Dowód na to, że wbrew pozorom manga opierająca się na haremie może być oryginalna.
description.ru:
Кацураги Кейма – мастер обольщения, который знает сотни приемов, как влюбить в себя девушку, с легкостью предугадывает каждый её шаг и называет себя Богом-Обольстителем.   
А ведь именно такого ищут… в аду, откуда сбежало множество душ, что закрадываются в сердца невинных девушек и преспокойно там живут. И по мнению здешнего руководства, Кацураги и есть тот единственный, кто может покорить сердце жертвы, освободив от сбежавшей души, а посему заключают с ним договор.   
Но они просчитались в одном - Кацураги обожает виртуальных девушек, а живых, настоящих, считает мусором, не достойных его божественного внимания. Однако ему придется что-то срочно придумать, иначе он лишится головы.
description.vi: Katsuragi Keima là một cậu học sinh có khả năng chinh phục mọi cô gái ở trong game. Một lần khi đang trả lời email của các bạn say mê dating game, Katsuragi Keima thấy 1 bức email lạ trong hòm thư của mình. Theo nội dung bức email thì có một người nhờ Katsuragi Keima làm cho các cô gái phải "Fall in love". Với tính cách "không có cô gái trong dating game nào ko thể chinh phục", Katsuragi Keima đã ko ngần ngại ấn Reply và sau đó một con quỷ đáng yêu tên Erushi xuất hiện và cuộc chơi bắt đầu. Katsuragi Keima phải tìm cách cho những cô gái mà Erushi chỉ định phải lòng với cậu. Nếu Katsuragi Keima từ chối thì đồng nghĩa cậu sẽ bị "mất đầu" do bản giao ước, liệu cậu có thể làm được điều này giống như với những cô gái ở trong game không...
description.pt-br: Katsuragi Keima é conhecido como o Deus da Conquista nos jogos de namoro 2D, Um dia ele recebe um contrato em forma de e-mail do chefe dos demônios desafiando ele a conquistar um certo tipo de garota, pensando ele ser um desafio de mais outro jogo ele aceita o contrato, e a partir dai com a ajuda (ou não) de Elsie, ele é forçado a conquistar garotas reais para não perder a cabeça, que é o que acontece se ele quebrar o contrato. Katsuragi Keima é conhecido como o Deus da Conquista nos jogos de namoro 2D, Um dia ele recebe um contrato em forma de e-mail do chefe dos demônios desafiando ele a conquistar um certo tipo de garota, pensando ele ser um desafio de mais outro jogo ele aceita o contrato, e a partir dai com a ajuda (ou não) de Elsie, ele é forçado a conquistar garotas reais para não perder a cabeça, que é o que acontece se ele quebrar o contrato.

description.en:
At the risk of his own life, a young man sets foot in the ruins of a devastated old world. His name is Akira, and in order to claw his way out of the hellhole that is his birthplace of Slumtown, the boy became a hunter. In the wastelands he happens upon a strange woman, standing perfectly still, stark naked.   
She is beautiful, but it seems that only he can see her. She exists incorporeal, tantalizingly beyond any touch, and she tells him her name is Alpha.  
Alpha won’t show even a sliver of her real intentions, but with a wide smile, she brings Akira his first commission as a hunter. Akira takes the task, if only to become a stronger hunter, and having entered a contract, their dramatic lives in the hunting profession was set to begin.  
  
From Stories of the Boy Hunter as recorded by the Eastern Hunters’ association.  
Written post-collapse of scientific civilization.

altTitles.ms: Melebihi Suami Isteri, Namun Bukan Kekasih.

altTitles.en: More Than A Married Couple, But Not Lovers.

altTitles.pt-br: Mais do que um casal, menos do que um amante.

altTitles.th: แผนสมรักไม่สมเลิฟ

altTitles.de: Mehr wie ein Ehepaar, aber weniger als Liebhaber.

description.en: Jirou, a third-year in high school, is forced to live with a gyaru named Akari under a course called the "Couple Practical". In order to be paired with their own romantic interests, they're going to act as a married couple…!?
description.ja: 高校三年生になった次郎は、「夫婦実習」という授業の一環で非リア充な自分とは正反対の存在のクラスのギャル・渡辺星と一緒に暮らすことになってしまう。だが、ペアを入れ替えられる制度を知った二人は、それぞれの好きな人と一緒になるために無理矢理【夫婦】らしい事を演じるのだが…!?
description.vi: Yakuin Jirou, nam sinh năm ba cao trung. Cậu ta buộc phải sống chung nhà với một gái Gyaru tên là Watanabe Akari. Lý do là vì đợt huấn luyện “Cặp đôi“ của trường mà hai người họ theo học. Để được sống với người tình trong mộng của mình, hai người họ phải đã lên kế hoạch sống cùng nhau như một cặp vợ chồng.

title.en: Akuyaku Reijou Level 99: Watashi wa UraBoss desu ga Maou de wa Arimasen

altTitles.en: Villainess Level 99 ~I May Be the Hidden Boss but I'm Not the Demon Lord~

altTitles.ja: 悪役令嬢レベル99～私は裏ボスですが魔王ではありません～

altTitles.id: Antagonis Level 99~ Aku Memang Bos Rahasia, Tapi Aku Bukanlah Raja Iblis~

altTitles.th: ยัยตัวร้าย เลเวล99

altTitles.vi: Nữ Phụ Phản Diện Lv99! Tôi Là Trùm Cuối Nhưng Không Phải Là Ma Vương!

altTitles.ru: Злодейка 99 уровня: Я могу быть скрытым боссом, но я не Король демонов

altTitles.fr: Personnage au niveau 99 - Bien que je sois en réalité le boss caché, je ne suis pas le Roi Démon

description.en:
I reincarnated as the "Villainess Eumiella" from an RPG Otome game. In the main story, Eumiella is merely a side character, but after the ending, she re-enters the story as the Hidden Boss, a character boasting high stats on par with the heroes! 

Lighting a fire in my gamer's soul, and taking advantage of being left on my own in my parent's territory, I trained, trained, and trained! As a result of my training… by the time I enrolled in the academy, I managed to reach level 99. 

Though I had planned to live out my days as inconspicuously and peacefully as possible, soon after entering the school, I'm suspected by the Heroine and Love Interests of being the "Demon Lord"…?  
  
Based on a popular web novel of seeking a peaceful life, a fantasy story of the strongest villainess!

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/46067)
description.id:
Aku bereinkarnasi menjadi antagonis "Dolkness Eumelia" dari gim otome RPG. Di cerita utamanya, Eumelia hanyalah seorang karakter sampingan, tapi setelah ending, ia memasuki cerita lagi dengan menjadi bos rahasia, menjadi karakter yang mempunyai status lebih tinggi daripada pahlawan!!  
  
Memantik jiwa gamer-ku, lalu mengambil kesempatan karena ditinggal oleh keluargaku di wilayah mereka, aku berlatih! Berlatih! Lalu pada akhir pelatihanku saat aku baru memasuki akademi, ternyata levelku mencapai 99.  
  
Walaupun aku sudah membuat rencana untuk hidup tanpa mencolok dan damai, beberapa saat setelah masuk sekolah, aku disangka "Raja Iblis" oleh si Heroine dan Para Target Cintanya …?  
  
Diangkat dari Web Novel yang populer yang mencari kehidupan damai, sebuah cerita fantasi tentang antagonis terkuat!
description.vi: Yumiera Dorkness là con gái của một Bá tước, bị mọi người và cả chính cha mẹ mình ghẻ lạnh chỉ vì màu tóc, nguyên nhân là do Ma Vương tóc cũng màu đen giống hệt cô. Một hôm cô chợt nhớ ra được kí ức kiếp trước và cô đã trọng sinh vào một Otome game, cô không trọng sinh vào nữ chính mà lại là nữ phụ phản diện – người mà sau này trở thành trùm cuối của game!? Đây chính là một cuộc hành trình kể về một cô gái chống lại số phận nghiệt ngã, sống một cuộc đời yên bình và tránh trở thành trùm cuối để rồi dính bad end!

title.en: Saitei Chara ni Tensei shita Ore wa Ikinokoritai

altTitles.ja: 最低キャラに転生した俺は生き残りたい

altTitles.en: I Have Been Reincarnated as the Worst Character Possible, and I Am Determined to Survive

description.en: Jin reincarnates into the most hated and worst character in the game he played before he died. If the same scenario is followed, he will fall into darkness after three years... In an attempt to avoid such a fate, Jin begins a life as an adventurer—?
description.ja: ジンは、生前遊んでいたゲームの中でも、最も憎まれ役の最低キャラに転身してしまう。シナリオどおりなら、3年後に悪に堕ちてしまう……！　そんな運命を回避しようと、ジンは冒険者としての生活を始めるのだが――？
description.pt-br: Jin reencarna no pior e mais odiado personagem do jogo que jogou antes de morrer. Se o mesmo cenário for seguido, ele cairá na escuridão depois de três anos... Na tentativa de evitar tal destino, Jin começa uma vida como aventureiro—?

description.en:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

description.en:
This series is a precursor to Hiroshi Masumura’s Atagoal. It was serialized in Monthly Magazine Garo (月刊漫画ガロ) from May to December 1975.

The story depicts the people of Yonezaad, rising up against the re-invasion of King Carmel, who once ruled the Yonezaad continent.

Many characters in Atagoal would make their first appearances in this series (Ex. Hideyoshi, Tempura, Gilbars, and Pantsu) although their roles are significantly different in this series than those from future Atagoal publications.

A mysterious syndrome turns schoolgirls into homicidal monsters behind numerous atrocities in Japan. However, nothing is what it seems and when Chika Amagi is arrested for the brutal murder of five people.
description.es: Un misterioso síndrome convierte a las colegialas en monstruos homicidas detrás de numerosas atrocidades en Japón. Sin embargo, nada es lo que parece y cuando Chika Amagi es arrestado por el brutal asesinato de cinco personas, ¡comienza un viaje a aguas desconocidas y turbulentas!
description.fr:
Au Japon, un mystérieux syndrome transforme les écolières d'un établissement en monstres sanguinaires, capables de tuer leurs semblables avec un sang-froid incroyable. Dans cette période de trouble, Chika Amagi, étudiante sans histoire, est arrêtée pour le meurtre terrible de cinq personnes…   


---
description.ja: 活発で食いしん坊な、普通の女の子だったはずの彼女は、ある事件をきっかけに「羽黒刑務所」へと導かれる。島に建てられたその刑務所には、メデューサ症候群と呼ばれる殺人少女たちだけが集められているのであった。彼女たちに宿る凶悪とは――!?
description.pt-br: Uma síndrome misteriosa torna jovens garotas em monstros homicidas por trás de diversas atrocidades no Japão. Entretanto, nada é o que parece quando Chika Amagai é presa pelo assassinato brutal de cinco pessoas e é levada a uma prisão em uma ilha para estas assassinas!

title.en: Harem Ou no Isekai Press Manyuuki ~Saikyou Musou no Ojisan wa Arayuru Shuzoku wo Yome ni suru~

altTitles.ja: ハーレム王の異世界プレス漫遊記 ～最強無双のおじさんはあらゆる種族を嫁にする～

altTitles.en: Harem King's Press Journey in Another World: The Strongest Warrior Uncle Takes Wives from All Races

description.en: The erotic-comedy fantasy begins with a gentleman uncle who brings justice while doing some consensual seeding here and there.
description.es:
Un hombre que había muerto en soledad pidió a la diosa Nike que lo reencarnara en una «versión variante de un Tanetsuke Ojisan» y se reencarnó con el nombre de Genji.
Nike es convertida en la pollita 'Pinoko' como acompañante por su jefa, la diosa, y tiene que trabajar con Genji.
Tras reencarnarse, Genji confiesa su amor a Cindy, la recepcionista del gremio, pero ella le rechaza, diciendo que le gustan los hombres fuertes. Entonces Genji se marcha a derrotar al dragon negro más fuerte que se rumorea en el gremio.
La comedia erótica de fantasía de un tío con buen corazón que ayuda a los débiles, aplasta a los fuertes y protege a la mujer que le gusta!
description.ja: 孤独死してしまった男は女神ニケに「動けるバージョンの種付けおじさん」になりたいと願い、自らにゲンジと名付けて転生した。ニケは上司の女神にお目付け役としてひよこの「ぴのこ」にされてしまいゲンジと行動をともにすることに。ゲンジは冒険者ギルドの受付嬢であるシンディに告白するが、強い男が好きなのと断られてしまう。そこで彼女に受け入れてもらうため、ギルドで噂になっていた最強の黒竜討伐へ向かうことになり――。
description.es-la:
Un hombre que había muerto en soledad pidió a la diosa Nike que lo reencarnara en una «versión variante de un Tanetsuke Ojisan» y se reencarnó con el nombre de Genji.
Nike es convertida en la pollita 'Pinoko' como acompañante por su jefa, la diosa, y tiene que trabajar con Genji.
Tras reencarnarse, Genji confiesa su amor a Cindy, la recepcionista del gremio, pero ella le rechaza, diciendo que le gustan los hombres fuertes. Entonces Genji se marcha a derrotar al dragon negro más fuerte que se rumorea en el gremio.
La comedia erótica de fantasía de un tío con buen corazón que ayuda a los débiles, aplasta a los fuertes y protege a la mujer que le gusta!

title.en: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 9 - The JOJOLands

altTitles.ja-ro: JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken Part 9 -  The JoJoLands

altTitles.ja: ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 Part9 The JOJOLands

altTitles.es-la: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Parte 9 - Las JOJOLandias

altTitles.pl: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Część 9 - The JoJoLands

altTitles.fr: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Partie 9 - The JOJOLands

altTitles.pt-br: A Estranha Aventura de JoJo, Parte 9: As JoJoLândias

altTitles.it: Le Bizzarre Avventure di JoJo: Le JOJOLands

altTitles.ja: ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 第9部 ザ・ジョジョランズ

description.en:
The ninth story arc of Jojo’s Bizarre Adventure. 

O’ahu, present day. Dua Lipa is the trending musician, and COVID is still a major concern. On this island lives a 15-year-old boy named Jodio Joestar. Living with his brother and mother, he acts as a dealer for certain illegal substances. One day, his employer comes and shows him an excellent find: a Japanese person has landed in Hawaii with a diamond worth over six million dollars. Normally it would be impossible to steal, but for someone with a stand…

This is a story of a young boy and his quest to become rich.
description.hu:
Ez a Jojo's Bizarre Adventure kilencedik történetíve.

O'ahu, napjainkban. Dua Lipa a trendi előadó és a COVID még mindig a fő gond. Ezen a szigeten él egy 15 éves srác, Jodio Joestar. Bátyával és édesanyjával él, dílerként dolgozik és bizonyos illegális anyagokat árul. Egy nap, a főnöke mutat neki egy kiválló fogást: egy japán személy Hawaiira érkezett egy hat millió dollárt érő gyémánttal. Normális esetben lehetetlen lenne ellopni, de akinek standje van...

Ez egy fiatal fiú és az ő küldetésének a története, hogy gazdag legyen.
description.it: O'ahu, oggi. Dua Lipa è la musicista di tendenza e il COVID è ancora una delle principali preoccupazioni. Su quest'isola vive un ragazzo di 15 anni di nome Jodio Joestar. Vive con il fratello e la madre e fa lo spacciatore di alcune sostanze illegali. Un giorno, il suo datore di lavoro arriva e gli mostra un'eccellente scoperta: un giapponese è sbarcato alle Hawaii con un diamante del valore di oltre sei milioni di dollari. Normalmente sarebbe impossibile da rubare, ma per qualcuno con una posizione... Questa è la storia di un ragazzo e della sua ricerca della ricchezza.
description.uk:
Дев’ята сюжетна арка «Неймовірних пригод Джоджо». Оаху, теперішній час. Дуа Ліпа – популярна музикантка, а COVID-19 досі викликає серйозне занепокоєння. На цьому острові мешкає 15-річний хлопчик на ім'я Джодіо Джостар. Живе з братом і матір'ю, торгує певними забороненими речовинами. Одного разу його бос прийшов до нього і показав неймовірну знахідку: японець висадився на Гаваях з діамантом вартістю понад шість мільйонів доларів! Зазвичай, вкрасти таку коштовність було б неможливо, але для того, хто має стенд… 
Це історія про молодого хлопця та його прагнення розбагатіти.
description.es-la: Cierto japonés ingresó a la isla de Hawái con un diamante de valor de 6 millones de dólares. En la isla de Oahu vive un chico llamado Jodio Joestar, cuya meta es arrebatar el diamante de las manos de esa persona. Junto a sus asociados, irán a la quinta de esa persona. Sin embargo, ¿Qué misterios les esperan?

altTitles.th: สามัญขยันรั่ว

description.de: Währendessen der Titel "alltägliches Leben" bedeutet ist der Inhalt alles andere als alltäglich. Es handelt sich um ein komplett bizarres und verücktes "alltags Leben" von einer gruppe High School Schüler. Das Setting ist eine außergewöhnliche Schule, wo du den Rektor sehen kannst wie er mit einen Reh kämpft oder einen Roboter Arm. Wie auch immer, es gibt immernoch normale Geshichten, wie ein Kartenhaus bauen oder einen Test schreiben für den du dich nicht vorbereitet bist. Der Stil ist süß aber mischt auch extreme Ausdrücke und Actionszenen für Überraschende Komedie Einlagen.
description.en:
While the title suggests a story of simple, everyday school life, the contents are more the opposite. The setting is a strange school where you may see the principal wrestle a deer or a robot's arm hide a rollcake. However there are still normal stories, like making a card castle or taking a test you didn't study for. The art style is cute but mixes with extreme expressions and action sequences for surprising comedy bits.

(The original magazine run ends at Chapter 192)
description.ru: Обычная манга про обыную японскую жизнь.
description.uk: Хоча назва вказує на щось буденне, вона є абсолютним протилежним до того, що коїться у манзі. Дії відбуваються у дуже дивній школі, де директор не проти побоксувати з оленем. Або робот, у руці якого сховано тістечко. Звісно не обійшлося без буденності, як от коли вірша забув вивчити і вчиш на уроці. Або картковий дім, який ти вже майже добудував, руйнується вщент! Словом, небуденна буденність.
description.pt-br: Enquanto o título sugere uma história simples de vida escolar, todos os dias, o conteúdo é mais o contrário. O cenário é uma escola estranha, onde você poderá ver o principal lutar com um cervo ou o braço de um robô esconder um bolo. No entanto ainda há histórias normais, como fazer um castelo de cartas ou de um teste que você não estudou. O estilo de arte é bonito, mas se mistura com expressões extremas e sequências de ação para os bits de comédia surpreendentes...

description.en: After saving Earth, aliens have taken up residence with the humans in Japan. Nomamoto, a factory worker with an abusive alien boss, one day meets Kitami, who tells her his own family was killed by aliens. The two quickly forge a friendship, but one day Kitami does the unthinkable…
description.id: Setelah menyelamatkan Bumi, para alien tinggal bersama manusia di Jepang. Nomamoto, seorang pekerja pabrik dengan bos alien yang kejam, suatu hari bertemu dengan Kitami, yang mengatakan bahwa keluarganya sendiri dibunuh oleh alien. Keduanya dengan cepat menjalin persahabatan, tetapi suatu hari Kitami melakukan hal yang tidak terpikirkan...
description.ja: <毎週月曜更新>宇宙人が地球を救ってから、人間と宇宙人が共に住むようになった日本。工場で宇宙人の上司にこき使われるノマモトは、家族を宇宙人に殺されたという北見と出会う。仲を深める2人だが、ある日北見がとんでもないことをしてしまい…
description.ru: Пришельцы спасли Землю и обосновались с людьми в Японии. Номамото, работающая на фабрике с отвратительным боссом-пришельцем, однажды встречает Китами, который рассказывает ей, что семью его убили пришельцы. Между ними быстро возникает дружба, но однажды Китами совершает немыслимое...
description.uk: Після порятунку Землі прибульцями, Японія стала спільним домом для них та людей. Номото, яка змушена терпіти знущання від свого боса-прибульця на заводі, зустрічає Кітамі, чиє серце розбите втратою сім'ї, вбитої прибульцями. Між ними виникає щира дружба, яка переходить до здійснення їх бажань... винищення всіх прибульців...
description.pt-br: Após salvar a Terra, os alienígenas passaram a viver com os humanos no Japão. Nomamoto, uma operária de fábrica com um chefe alienígena abusivo, um dia conhece Kitami, que conta que sua própria família foi morta por alienígenas. Os dois rapidamente formam uma amizade, mas um dia Kitami faz o impensável…

title.en: Breaking Into The Body of The Emperor's Daughter

description.en:
After transmigrating to another world as a wealthy young master, Su Changqing only wanted to live a low-profile life as a rich second-generation heir and enjoy his days in comfort. However, his plans are suddenly disrupted when his family faces an unexpected crisis, and he accidentally discovers the Emperor's secret - that she is actually a woman.

While he initially feared the female Emperor would stop at nothing to silence him, to his surprise, she instead becomes interested in his mysterious ability to transform his appearance. She wants him to become her male body double. What Su Changqing never expected was that being the female Emperor's male substitute would mean he has to visit the imperial harem on his very first day. His peaceful life completely falls apart from that moment on...

title.en: The Blood Princess and the Knight

description.en:
I, who was a sacred knight, was defeated and captured in a battle against the vampire clan.   

"Oh? Letting you die? In your dreams! Accept my embrace, and in the future, please take care of me, my lovely daughter~"   

The silver-haired Queen of the Vampire Clan lifted my chin and smiled cunningly, her sharp canines drawing closer to my neck… 

---
**Links:**
- [Alternative raw (Bilibili)](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc28199)

title.en: The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past (HIMEKAWA Akira)

altTitles.ja: ゼルダの伝説 神々のトライフォース

altTitles.ja-ro: Zelda no Densetsu Kamigami no Triforce

description.en: At the beginning of A Link to the Past, a young boy named Link is awakened by a telepathic message from Princess Zelda, who says that she is locked in the dungeon of Hyrule Castle. As the message closes, Link finds his uncle ready for battle, telling Link to remain in bed. However, Link ignores his uncle's command, and after his uncle leaves, follows him to Hyrule Castle. When he arrives, he finds his uncle seriously wounded. Link's uncle tells Link to rescue Princess Zelda from her prison, giving him a sword and shield. Link navigates the castle and rescues Zelda from her cell, and the two escape into a secret passage through the sewers that leads to a sanctuary.
description.pt-br: No início de A Link to the Past, um garoto chamado Link está acordado por uma mensagem telepática da princesa Zelda, que diz que ela está trancada no calabouço do castelo de Hyrule. Como a mensagem fecha, Link encontra seu tio pronto para a batalha, dizendo Link para permanecer na cama. No entanto, Link ignora o comando de seu tio, e depois de seu tio sai, segue-o para Hyrule Castle. Quando ele chega, ele encontra seu tio gravemente ferido. O tio de ligação diz Link para resgatar a Princesa Zelda de sua prisão, dando-lhe uma espada e escudo. Ligação navega o castelo e resgata Zelda de sua cela, e os dois escapam para uma passagem secreta através dos esgotos que leva a um santuário.

description.en: 29-year-old freeter Ikuta Hiroto is a carefree young man without a love life, regular job, or any real worries about the future. He inherits an old house from the neighbourhood granny, where his 18-year-old cousin, Natsumi moves in with him to study art in Tokyo. This is a story about Hiroto and the people around him who struggle with life.
description.ru: Двадцатидевятилетний работник на полставки Икута Хирото — беззаботный парень, у которого нет ни личной жизни, ни постоянной работы, ни каких-либо беспокойств о собственном будущем. В наследство от соседской бабушки ему достаётся старый дом, куда переезжает его восемнадцатилетняя двоюродная сестра Нацуми, чтобы учиться искусству в Токио. Это история о Хирото и окружающих его людях, которые борются с жизнью.
description.uk: 29-річний Ікута Хірото — безтурботний молодий чоловік без особистого життя, постійної роботи та реальних турбот про майбутнє. Він успадковує старий будинок від сусідської бабусі, куди переїжджає його 18-річна двоюрідна сестра Нацумі, щоб вивчати мистецтво в Токіо. Це історія про Хірото та людей навколо нього, які борються з життям.
description.pt-br: Ikuta Hiroto, de 29 anos, é um jovem despreocupado sem uma vida amorosa, emprego regular ou qualquer preocupação real com o futuro: um "freeter". Ele herda uma velha casa da avó do bairro, onde sua prima de 18 anos, Natsumi, vai morar com ele para estudar arte em Tóquio. Esta é uma história sobre Hiroto e as pessoas ao seu redor que lutam contra a vida.

title.en: The New Legend of the Strongest Man Kurosawa

description.en: The man of legend has come back to life! Kurosawa, who led the homeless army in a fierce battle against a group of delinquents in *The Legend of A Strongest Man Kurosawa*, was thought to have gone to his eternal rest. After spending eight whole years in a hospital bed, he makes a miraculous comeback in 2013! The fabled man returns to the present life to create a new legend... in spite of the fact that the present life is not quite so great.

It is said that there is no such thing as an "undefeated" player in mahjong due to the large element of luck. However, an undefeated player suddenly appears on Japan's largest online mahjong site, Jansen! His name is "M," and in order to find out if M is cheating, Sonokawa Junpei, a poor part-time worker, approaches him under the guise of a fake friendship. However, when he discovers the secret of M's strength, he begins to develop a passionate friendship with him... The tale of mahjong friendship that challenges the wall of undefeatedness begins!

title.en: The Magical Revolution of the Reincarnated Princess and the Genius Young Lady

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensei Oujo to Tensai Reijou no Mahou Kakumei

altTitles.ja: 転生王女と天才令嬢の魔法革命

altTitles.zh-hk: 轉生王女與天才千金的魔法革命

altTitles.zh: 转生王女与天才千金的魔法革命

altTitles.zh-ro: Zhuǎnshēng wángnǚ yǔ tiāncái qiānjīn de mófǎ gémìng

altTitles.ko: 전생 왕녀와 천재 영애의 마법 혁명

altTitles.ru: Магическая революция перерождённой принцессы и гениальной юной леди

altTitles.id: Revolusi Ajaib Putri yang Bereinkarnasi dan Wanita Muda yang Jenius

altTitles.it: La rivoluzione magica della principessa reincarnata e della signorina geniale

altTitles.vi: Cuộc cách mạng ma thuật của công chúa chuyển sinh và tiểu thư thiên tài

altTitles.th: การปฏิวัติเวทมนตร์ขององค์หญิงเกิดใหม่กับยัยคุณหนูยอดอัจฉริยะ

description.en:
Despite her supposed ineptitude with regular magic, Princess Anisphia defies the aristocracy's expectations by developing "magicology," a unique magical theory based on memories from her past commoner life. One day, she witnesses the brilliant noblewoman Euphyllia unjustly stripped of her title as the kingdom's next monarch. Thus Anisphia concocts a plan to help Euphyllia regain her good name  somehow involving them living together and researching magic! Little do these two ladies know, however, that their chance encounter will alter not only their own futures, but those of the kingdom... and the entire world!

---
- [Official Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n8558fh/)
description.ja:
「魔法があるなら、空を飛べるのに…」

パレッティア王国の王女・アニスフィアは、幼少期にふとそう思ったのをきっかけに、前世の記憶を思い出した。

時は流れ――。

前世の知識を活用した独自の技術「魔学」を編み出したアニスフィアは、自らが開発した魔女箒のテスト飛行中、偶然にもあらゆる魔法を使いこなす天才令嬢・ユフィリアが公衆の面前で婚約破棄を受けている現場に遭遇してしまう。傷つき、涙を浮かべるユフィリアの姿に、アニスフィアは――。

「さて行こうかユフィリア嬢、私が攫ってあげる！」
description.es-la: Anis Sophia, a princesa que lembrou de sua vida passada quando criança, assim como o seu amor intenso pela magia do seu eu antigo, saiu para vivenciar fantasias nesse mundo de fantasia. Um dia, durante um acidente mágico, ela se deparou com uma cena em que seu irmão, Algard, estava rompendo o noivado com sua pretendente, Euphilia. O que ninguém poderia prever é que esse estranho encontro acabaria mudando o rumo da história.

description.en: SEXY Lupin III is a 5 chapter side story of Lupin III published to promote the airing of Lupin III Part 3 (anime), featuring more explicit versions of its episodes.

altTitles.ja: きみの横顔を見ていた

altTitles.en: I See Your Face, Turned Away

description.en: Hikari's your typical freshmen in high school who's been recently daydreaming about Mari’s, her shy best friend, a love story. She decides to ship Mari with Ootani-kun, their classmate, after finding out about his crush on Mari when his friend, Asagiri-kun, tried getting the two to talk. The main character is Mari, the leading man is Ootani, and Hikari is the typical best friend in the story. Not bad… right? A youthful story between four kids going through unrequited love.
description.fr:
Nous suivons le quotidien de quatre lycéens, deux filles et deux garçons, sur leur amitié parfois compliquée et leur amour non-partagé.

Hikari et Mari sont deux lycéennes qui s'entendent bien et qui sont amies. Hikari est une jeune fille plutôt banale et assez transparente alors que Mari est lumineuse. Elles se rapprochent petit à petit de Otani, un garçon bruyant et populaire et de son ami, Asagari, qui est plus calme et posé.
description.pt-br: Hikari é a típica caloura do ensino médio que recentemente sonhou acordada com a história de amor de Mari, sua tímida melhor amiga. Ela decide shippar Mari com Ootani-kun, seu colega de classe, depois de descobrir sobre sua paixão por Mari quando seu amigo, Asagiri-kun, tentou fazer os dois conversarem. A personagem principal é Mari, o protagonista é Ootani e Hikari é a típica melhor amiga da história. Nada mal... certo? Uma história juvenil entre quatro crianças passando por um amor não correspondido.

title.en: Love Live! Sunshine!! AZALEA COMIC ANTHOLOGY

altTitles.ja: ラブライブ！サンシャイン!! AZALEAコミックアンソロジー

description.en:
Love Live! Sunshine!!: AZALEA Comic Anthology
Cover Illustration: Mezashi

1. Otome Chick ka nan ? (乙女チックかなん?) by Kou Kuzu
2. Onayami?! AZALEA (お悩み?! AZALEA) by Mezashi
3. Torikoriko Please!! (トリコリコPLEASE!!) by Shinji Tanaka & Dia Fuuka
4. Tokimeki Sakushigaku (ときめき作詞学) by Ripo Day
5. Mezase AZALEA no Hana (目指せAZALEAの花) by Yuuki Nanaji
6. Galaxy Hide and Seek (GALAXY HidE and SeeK) by Uzuki Houshou & Satsuki Konoe
7. Hanamaru to Yousei no Fuku (花丸と妖精の服) by Gratin-dori
8. Innocent Bird (INNOCENT BIRD) by Shinji Tanaka & Dia Fuuka
9. Tokimeki Bunruigaku (ときめき分類学) by Nata Nakane

Some children live in a comfortably numb world, surrounded by walls. However, one day, a kid named Tokio receives a message asking "Do you want to go outside of the outside?"    Now, from the Heaven that is starting to crumble, the children begin their adventure!
description.fa:
دنیایی پوچ که بچه‌ها در آن با رفاه کامل همراه با دیوارهایی که درون و بیرون را جدا می‌کنند، زندگی می‌کنند اما همه‌ی این‌ها زمانی تغییر می‌کند که یکی از بچه‌ها به نام تاکیو‌ پیامی با این متن دریافت می‌کند: «می‌خوای به خارج از چیزی که اون بیرونه بری؟»

حال از بهشتی که درحال نابودی است بچه‌ها ماجراجویی خود را آغاز می‌کنند.
description.fr: Dans un immense jardin coupé du monde, un groupe d'enfants jouit d'une vie douce et d'insouciance, protégé par des scientifiques. Le monde extérieur leur est inconnu mais certains d'entre eux se questionnent : qu'y a-t-il au-delà des murs de leur paradis ?Pendant ce temps, dans un Japon dévasté par un mystérieux cataclysme, Maru et Kiruko, deux adolescents de la génération post-catastrophe, tentent de survivre dans un monde désolé peuplé de pillards et de monstres difformes. Leur objectif : atteindre "le Paradis".
description.ja: 美しい壁に囲まれた世界で暮らす子供たち。少年・トキオはある日、「外の外に行きたいですか？」というメッセージを受け取る。一方、外では、マルとおねえちゃんがサバイバル生活をしながら、天国を求めて、魔境となった世界を旅している。未来の日本を「あね散歩」。
description.pt: Em um mundo pós-apocalíptico, dois jovens: Maru um garoto amigável e que esconde vários segredos; E Kiruko, uma garota impetuosa e protetora. Juntos eles vagam pelo cenário desolado em busca de um chamado "paraíso". Enquanto isso, em um outro lugar isolado do resto do mundo, vivem várias crianças sem saber do que acontece no exterior. Como essas duas histórias vão se conectar?
description.ru:
Две истории, которые непременно связаны…

Таинственный Мару — мальчик, у которого есть одна цель: найти «Рай»! На пути к ним он обрёл телохранителя — Кируко. Она тоже не так уж проста, как может показаться на первый взгляд. В этом путешествии к «Небесам» они вместе посетят много мест ушедшей эпохи и встретят разных врагов!

Токио — девочка, которая живёт за великими стенами «Небес»! Это место можно назвать раем. Вокруг высокие деревья, зеленая трава, плантации свежих овощей и даже есть небольшой водоем! Вместе с Токио здесь можно встретить и других детей, каждый из которых обладает своим особенным даром. В один из дней Токио получает сообщение: «Ты хочешь выбраться отсюда?» Кажется, с этого момента что-то странное начинает твориться в пределах «Небес»…
description.pt-br: Em um mundo pós-apocalíptico, dois jovens: Maru um garoto amigável e que esconde vários segredos; E Kiruko, uma garota impetuosa e protetora. Juntos eles vagam pelo cenário desolado em busca de um chamado "paraíso". Enquanto isso, em um outro lugar isolado do resto do mundo, vivem várias crianças sem saber do que acontece no exterior. Como essas duas histórias vão se conectar?

altTitles.ja: バイオレンスジャック
バイオレンスジャック　魔王降臨編

description.en:
September 11, 197x, In the whole Kanto region a magnitude 8-9 violent earthquake occurred. Scholars called it the great destruction of the Showa Era, but the people called it the earthquake from hell! Volcanoes erupted, buildings crumbled, Tokyo became decimated in a single day. The government, after failing to recover the city, abandons Tokyo and moves the capital. The survivors form a society with no laws. In this harsh lawless world emerges Jack, a 10 foot giant who annihilates anyone and anything in his path. The manga details his journey.  
  
The numbering is from the Complete Edition, with around 20 Chapters per volume.

altTitles.ja: 本好きの下剋上～司書になるためには手段を選んでいられません～第四部 貴族院の図書館を救いたい!

altTitles.ja-ro: Honzuki no Gekokujou ~Shisho ni Naru Tame ni wa Shudan wo Erandeiraremasen~ Dai 4-bu 「 Kizokuin no Toshokan wo Sukuitai!」

description.en:
As Rozemyne wakes up after almost two years she finds out that the world around her has undergone great change causing her to feel like Urashima Tarō from the Japanese fairy tale. However, there is no time for her to get acclimate to the new world as she is quickly sent off to the Royal Academy to become a true noble.   
She is presented with the difficult task of raising Ehrenfest's ranking while being surrounded by eccentric teachers and children from other duchies however she is motivated by the Royal Academy's giant library. While there are no other Archduke Candidates or members of royalty around Rozemyne commandeers the library!  
Here begins Part 4 of this biblio-fantasy as we enter the Royal Academy!
___
**Character Designer:** [Shiina You](https://mangadex.org/author/bf3b6af9-eac9-4886-be15-bc4a75640ede)

title.en: Onii-chan Is Done For! - Highschool ONIMAI (Doujinshi)

description.en: Without being able to return to being a man, Mahiro Oyama stayed as a girl since middle school and now has become a beautiful high-schooler who gets completely dominated by his first friend since the transformation, Momiji Hozuki, who has gotten really tall and became popular with the girls in their school.
description.pt-br: Sem poder voltar a ser homem, Mahiro Oyama permaneceu como uma menina desde o ensino fundamental e agora se tornou uma linda estudante do ensino médio que é completamente dominada por sua primeira amiga desde a transformação, Momiji Hozuki, que ficou muito alta e se tornou  popular entre as meninas da escola.

altTitles.ru: Приди же в Мир Демонов, Ирума-кун!

altTitles.th: อิรุมะคุงกับโรงเรียนปิศาจ

altTitles.ja: 魔入りました！入間くん

altTitles.id: Selamat datang di sekolah iblis! Iruma-kun

description.en: Hopeless pushover Iruma Suzuki has found himself in a devil of a predicament… His trashy parents have sold off his soul, and he now has to live and attend school in the Netherworld. But with his unique survival skills and doting demon grandfather’s support, Iruma will surely make it through this hellish experience. He’ll just need to subjugate rival classmates, summon familiars, and more, all while never revealing that he’s human… Easy as *aleph, bet, gimel*, right?
description.es:
Con una vida bastante desgraciada y unos padres vagos y avaros, Iruma es arrastrado al infierno contra su voluntad después de que estos lo vendan a un demonio. Pero para su sorpresa, la vida que le depara el inframundo es mucho mejor que la que tenía con su familia.

Bajo la tutela de su nuevo dueño, un poderoso, pero solitario demonio que sólo quería cumplir su anhelo de tener un nieto, empieza a asistir a un instituto del que este es director después de firmar cierto contrato con él.

Ahora, Iruma tiene que intentar adaptarse al mundo de los demonios mientras esconde su naturaleza humana y se enfrenta a los distintos desafíos que lo esperan en su nuevo instituto. ¡Su nueva vida demoníaca acaba de empezar!
description.ru: Четырнадцатилетний Судзуки Ирума только что был брошен и продан демону его безответственными родителями! Тем не менее, к своему удивлению, он оказывается теперь живет с демоном, как его приёмный внук. Затем он поступил в школу, где его дед — Салливан, работает в качестве директора. Так начинается необычайная школьная жизнь Ирумы-куна среди потусторонних, встречая много красочных лиц, принимая на себя сложные задачи, и сталкиваясь со своим истинным — я, когда он поднимается, чтобы стать кем-то великим. Уютная волшебная повседневность с случайным городским терроризмом.
description.tr: On dört yaşındaki Iruma Suzuki hiçbir isteğe hayır diyemez. Sorumsuz ailesi, onları geçinmek için onu tehlikeli işlerden tehlikeli işlere koşturtur ve sonra bir gün onu bir iblise satarlar! Ancak iblis, Iruma'yı torunu olarak evlat edinmek isteyince çok şaşırır. Bu isteği reddedemeyen Iruma, büyük iblis Sullivan'ın torunu olur. Yeni sevecen iblis dedesi onu, Sullivan'ın tesadüfen müdürü olduğu İblis Okulu Babyls'e kaydettirir. Böylece Iruma-kun'un diğer dünyadakiler arasındaki sıra dışı okul hayatı başlar; birçok renkli iblisle tanışır, zorlu mücadelelere atılır ve büyük biri olmak için yükselirken gerçek benliğiyle yüzleşir.
description.vi: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun là câu chuyện kể về cậu bé Suzuki Iruma, người đã bị bố mẹ mình kí khế ước bán cho ác ma để đổi lấy tiền tài và bình an. Cậu bé Iruma đáng thương từ lúc mới biết đi (1 tuổi) đã phải "ra xã hội" lăn lộn, buôn ba khắp nơi với hai vị phụ huynh "tưng tửng" cho đến ngày một Ác Ma đến rước cậu đến Ma giới theo khế ước. Tưởng chừng như sắp vào bụng quỷ thì vị Ác Ma già nua này đã khóc lóc yêu cầu cậu làm cháu trai ông ta, với bản tính lương thiện và tốt bụng đến cả bản thân mình cũng phải kinh ngạc, cậu bất đắc dĩ đã đồng ý lời đề nghị đó và nhập học trường Ác Ma theo ý ông ta. Chuyện gì sẽ xảy ra tiếp theo, mời các bạn theo dõi cuộc sống học đường đầy bất thường của Iruma-kun.
description.pt-br:
Iruma Suzuki, de quatorze anos, não pode dizer não a nenhum pedido. Seus pais irresponsáveis ​​o fazem trabalhar em empregos perigosos para sustentá-los, e então um dia eles o vendem para um demônio! Mas, para sua surpresa, o demônio quer adotar Iruma como seu neto?  

Incapaz de recusar seu pedido, Iruma torna-se neto do grande demônio Sullivan. Seu novo avô demônio amoroso o matricula na Demon School Babyls - onde Sullivan é coincidentemente o diretor. Assim começa a extraordinária vida escolar de Iruma-kun entre o outro mundo, encontrando muitos demônios coloridos, enfrentando desafios assustadores e enfrentando seu verdadeiro eu enquanto ele se torna alguém grande.

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 7, Cap 44. ]
[ 2° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 11, Cap 94. ]
[ 3° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 17, metade do Cap 147.]

description.en: These are the recollections of a group of men who bet everything on their bicycles. The central pillars of their respective teams, the 3rd years. New stories revealing their pasts is about to begin!!

title.en: My Dearest Self With Malice Aforethought

altTitles.ru: Мое дорогое Я со злым умыслом

altTitles.ja-ro: Shinai naru Boku e Satsui o Komete

altTitles.ja: 親愛なる僕へ殺意をこめて

description.de:
Auf den ersten Blick scheint Eiji ein ganz normaler Student zu sein, doch er hat ein Geheimnis: sein verstorbener Vater war ein berüchtigter Serienmörder, der für seine extreme Grausamkeit bekannt war.
Eines Tages wacht Eiji neben einem schönen fremden Mädchen auf, das anscheinend in ihn verliebt ist und behauptet, seine Freundin zu sein, doch eigenartigerweise kann er sich nicht an sie erinnern. Die letzten Tage scheinen wie aus seinem Gedächtnis gelöscht, und es fühlt sich an, als hätte jemand anders die Kontrolle übernommen. Zur selben Zeit findet die örtliche Polizei eine aufs Übelste verstümmelte Leiche, und für sie besteht kein Zweifel: Eijis Vater ist zurück... doch kann das wirklich sein?
description.en: Urashima Eiji, a college student, goes to sleep after a fun drinking night with his friends. When he wakes up he discovers a beautiful girl next to him who treats him as if they are in a loving relationship. Later, Eiji finds out that 4 days have passed since he went out with his crew. What did he do during all that time and why does he have no memory of it? By confronting that reality, he will be caught in tragedy…
description.ne: एइजी, कलेज उमेरको कुमारले कुनै दिन प्रेमिका हुने सपना देख्छ... अनि एक दिन आफ्नो "प्रेमिका" को साथ आफ्नो ओछ्यानमा उठ्छ! त्यति मात्र होइन, उसको साथीले उसलाई बताउँछ कि ऊ झगडामा परेको छ ... र त्यो तीन दिन बितिसक्यो जुन एइजीलाई याद छैन? के अँध्यारो रहस्यहरू लुकाइरहेका छ ... एइजी आफैले?
description.ru:
Урашима Эйджи, студент колледжа, засыпает после веселой ночи с друзьями. Когда он просыпается, он обнаруживает рядом с собой красивую девушку, которая ведет себя с ним, как со своим парнем. Позже Эйджи узнает, что с того вечера прошло 3 дня. Что он делал все это время и почему не помнит ничего об этом? Столкнувшись с реальностью, он попадет в трагедию…  
  
Itou Shouta's Twitter: [@shota\_itooooo](https://twitter.com/shota_itooooo)
description.vi: Urashima Eiji, một sinh viên đại học, đi ngủ sau một đêm uống rượu vui vẻ với bạn bè. Khi tỉnh dậy, anh phát hiện ra một cô gái xinh đẹp bên cạnh, người đối xử với anh như thể họ đang trong một mối quan hệ yêu đương. Sau đó, anh phát hiện ra rằng 4 ngày đã trôi qua kể từ khi anh đi ra ngoài cùng với đám bạn của mình. Anh ấy đã làm gì trong suốt thời gian đó và tại sao anh ấy không có ký ức về nó?. Khi đối mặt với thực tế đó, anh sẽ bị cuốn vào bi kịch...

altTitles.en: I Am The Top Ranker Newbie

altTitles.th: ผู้เล่นหน้าใหม่เลเวลแมกซ์

altTitles.ja: 俺だけレベルMAXなビギナー

description.de: Jin Hyuk ist Streamer und der einzige, der das Ende des Virtual-Reality-Spiels „Turm der Prüfungen“ erlebt hat. Da das Spiel jedoch immer mehr an Beliebtheit verliert, wird auch seine Streamer-Karriere immer hoffnungsloser. Doch eines Tages wird „Turm der Prüfungen" plötzlich zur Realität und die Welt steht vor dem Abgrund. Jin Hyuk, der sich im Spiel besser auskennt als jeder andere, wird zwangsläufig zur letzten Hoffnung der Menschheit!
description.en:
Kang Jinhyeok, a gaming streamer and content creator, is the only person who has cleared the game, [Tower of Trials]. However, as the game’s popularity declines, it becomes increasingly difficult for him to continue making a living as a content creator. Jinhyeok prepares to end his 11-year-long relationship with the game and say goodbye to his humble group of subscribers. But on that very day, the Tower of Trials appears in reality with a message saying that humanity will perish unless all players clear each floor within 90 days.

Jinhyeok, who knows the game better than anyone, decides to use his knowledge to his advantage and dominate the tower. 

"It’s time to show everyone what a hardcore gamer can do!"
description.fr: Le jeu de réalité virtuelle "La Tour de l'Épreuve" est officiellement démodé et le streamer Jinhyuk est le seul à être resté jusqu'au bout pour terminer le jeu. Quand un jour "La Tour de l'Épreuve" devient réalité, Jinhyuk qui connaît les éléments du jeu mieux que personne aura forcément un grand avantage sur les autres !
description.id: Jinhyuk, satu-satunya pemain game [MENARA UJIAN] yang menyelesaikan sampai akhir meski popularitas game telah menurun. Hingga suatu hari [MENARA UJIAN] menjadi kenyataan, Jinhyuk harus menyelesaikannya dengan segala elemen yang ia ketahui tentang game ini!
description.ja: ゲーム実況ストリーマーとして活動している主人公・鈴木裕人（すずきひろと）。彼は、万人があきらめたクソゲー『試練の塔』を挑戦しクリアした唯一のプレイヤーであった。念願のエンディングを見ることができたものの、もう誰も興味をもたないこのゲームはサービス終了が確実視されていた…。11年もかけクソゲーをクリアした裕人はこれを機に現実と向き合い、ゲーム実況者としての生活を終わらせることを決心した—。が次の日、現実世界に異変が起きる。街中に突如現れた不吉な塔、そして人類に課される生死をかけた試練。それはまさに裕人が11年の月日を費やしクリアした『試練の塔』そのものであった。塔の攻略法を把握している裕人はその経験を活かし、誰よりも強い最強のビギナーとしてあらたな試練に挑む！
description.ko:
게임 너튜버로 활동 중인 주인공 진혁은 유일하게
[시련의 탑]의 엔딩을 봤지만, 게임의 인기가 하락하며
더 이상 게임 너튜버로서의 삶도 유지하기 힘들어진다.

엔딩을 보았기에 이대로 게임을 마무리하려는 진혁.
바로 그날, [시련의 탑]은 현실이 되었다.
게임의 모든 요소를 다 알고 있는 진혁은
누구보다 빠르게 모든 것을 차지한다!

"진짜 고인물이 뭔지 보여주지."
description.ru:
Главный герой Джин Хек – игрок и стример, единственный, кто прошёл до конца «Башню испытаний».
Когда он увидел концовку игры, захотел бросить её. Но в тот же день «Башня испытания» стала реальностью. И главному герою не осталось ничего, кроме как показать, на что способен тот, кто знает все нюансы игры.

«Я покажу вам, что такое настоящий задрот!»
description.th: "จินฮยอก" สตรีมเมอร์หนุ่ม ผู้หลงใหลในการเล่นเกม ใช้เวลากว่า 11 ปี ในการบรรลุชั้นบนสุดของ '[หอคอยแห่งความทรหด] เกมแฟนตาซีเสมือนจริง' พอบรรลุเป้าหมายแล้ว จึงเกิดความคิดที่อยากจะล้มเลิกการเล่นเกม และการทำสตรีมมิ่ง แต่จู่ๆ วันหนึ่งเขาก็ตื่นมาพบว่า [หอคอยแห่งความทรหด] โผล่ขึ้นมาในชีวิตจริงซะอย่างนั้น!?
description.zh:
当游戏变为现实！
无名主播竟是唯一通关者！
男主镇赫是一名游戏主播，也是唯一一位“试炼之塔”游戏的通关玩家。随着“试炼之塔”这款游戏的热度下降，游戏主播的工作渐渐无法维持镇赫的生活。通关后的镇赫本想就此退游，然而游戏竟成为了现实。如果失败世界就会灭亡！对游戏了如指掌的镇赫还能在现实世界中通关吗？
description.pt-br: Jinhyuk, um viciado completo, foi o único a ter visto o final da [Torre dos Testes], mas à medida que a popularidade do jogo diminui, fica difícil manter a vida com o jogo. Jinhyuk quer terminar o jogo assim porque ele viu o final. Naquele mesmo dia, a [Torre dos Testes] se tornou uma realidade. Jinhyuk, que conhece todos os elementos do jogo, controla tudo mais rápido do que qualquer um! “Vou te mostrar o que é um profissional de verdade.”
description.zh-hk: 活躍於遊戲NewTube頻道的主角——振赫，他是唯一看過[試煉之塔]的結局，因為該款遊戲的人氣大跌，要經營NewTube頻道再也難以維持生計。 看完遊戲的結局後，原本振赫預計要結束不再玩遊戲。但就在當天，[試煉之塔]竟成為了現實。了解遊戲所有關卡的振赫，比誰都還要快占據所有物品。 「讓你見識什麼是真正的開掛高手。」

title.en: Koukousei WEB Sakka no Mote Seikatsu "Anta ga Kami Sakka na Wake Nai Deshou" to Boku o Futta Osanajimi ga Koukai Shiteru kedo Mou Osoi

altTitles.ja: 高校生WEB作家のモテ生活「あんたが神作家なわけないでしょ」と僕を振った幼馴染が後悔してるけどもう遅い

altTitles.en: The Teen Web Novelist is a Girl Magnet: Now My Crush Feels Bad for Rejecting Me!

description.en:
Yuta Uematsu is a aspiring novel writer who has long had feelings for his childhood friend Michiru Okuwa, who had always supported his creative work. He finally decided to confess his love to her, even though he didn't feel like he was a match for Michiru, the most popular girl at school. When Michiru brushed him off with the words, "It's impossible!" and stormed out, Yuta was left stunned in disbelief. Michiru went back to reading "Digital Masters," a very popular web novel. However, "Digital Masters" was actually Yuta's work.......

(Source: Natalie.mu, translated)
description.ja: 上松勇太は普通の高校生ではない!! 今世紀最大のヒットを記録した大人気WEB小説の著者である。ゆえに周囲には、美人編集者、アイドル歌手や人気声優など彼を溺愛する者ばかり!!そんな彼には想いを馳せる幼馴染が居た。ある日、勇太は告白する事を決意する…。その結果は…。

title.en: Power-Hara Genkai Yuusha, Maougun kara Koutaiguu de Scout sareru ~Yuusha Ranking 1-i na no ni Tedori ga Gomi sugite Seikatsu Dekimasen~

altTitles.ja: パワハラ限界勇者、魔王軍から好待遇でスカウトされる～勇者ランキング１位なのに手取りがゴミ過ぎて生活できません～

description.en:
In this modern age, there are many heroes and demon lords. There was a hero who ranked first in the hero rankings and had the title of "Strongest''. His name is Hero Allen. The strongest hero, who is recognized by everyone, has gained status and honor, and his life is in easy mode...

"That never happened!"

Orders to subjugate the Demon King are issued without a break. Even if you go to great lengths to subjugate a brutal demon lord, you will only receive an amount that even an average man can easily earn, excluding miscellaneous expenses. All expeditions are at my own expense. It's not very bad, but I can't live with it. He then confronts the demon king of destiny. The beautiful female demon lord made a proposal to the dissatisfied hero.

"Hero! Get hired on these conditions!"

The conditions were so favorable, that I was moved.
description.ja:
無数の勇者と魔王が存在する世界で、『最強』の称号を持つ勇者アレン。だが彼は、悩んでいた…
・絶え間ない魔王討伐命令
・王様からのパワハラ
・見合わない報酬

もう、我慢の限界!!

そんな金欠勇者に魔王から救いの手が!? 超好待遇のスカウトにアレンの選択は――

title.en: I Got a Girlfriend From a Shooting Star

altTitles.zh: 许愿后，天降成精的星星

altTitles.zh-ro: Xǔyuàn hòu, tiān jiàng chéng jīng de xīngxīng

altTitles.en: After Making a Wish, a Shooting Star Descended and Became a Spirit

description.en: What do I do if I like girls? I wished upon a shooting star, not expecting it to be granted straight away… so why did a spirit suddenly appear before me?

Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

In this world, witches must hunt down their magic! Deep in the forest, the terrifying king of magic and the strongest witch are locked in deadly combat. But suddenly, a young boy joins the fray. His name is Ichi and he is just a hunter. But he has the power to flip the magic world upside down in this magic hunting fantasy epic!
description.ru: В этом мире ведьмы охотятся за своей магией! В глубине леса ужасающая маджика и сильнейшая ведьма схлестнулись в бою не на жизнь, а на смерть. Но вдруг к битве присоединяется молодой парнишка. Его зовут Ити, и он обычный охотник. Но у него есть сила перевернуть весь мир магии с ног на голову в этом эпохальном магическом фэнтези об охоте!
description.pt-br: Neste mundo, as bruxas devem caçar sua magia! Nas profundezas da floresta, o terrível rei da magia e a bruxa mais forte estão presos em um combate mortal. Mas, de repente, um jovem garoto se junta à briga. Seu nome é Ichi e ele é apenas um caçador. Mas ele tem o poder de virar o mundo mágico de cabeça para baixo neste épico de fantasia de caça mágica!
